TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1663
TEI.2.document_sender: Faris and White, M. B. Nuckols
TEI.2.document_title: Faris and White to Stephen F. Austin, 06-25-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Faris and White, June 25, 1827.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1663

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Faris and White, June 25, 1827.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felepe D Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-25-1827">June 25. 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Faris and White*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p* *p*Cash loned_________________________________________________________ 8. 50*/p*
*p*1 Bottle Porter .50 2 Bottles and Brandy____________________________ 3.00*/p*
*p*1 Hat $7.00 6 lbs Crackers_____________________________________________ 8. 50*/p*
*p*$20. 00*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Willis A Ferris*/person_mentioned* personally appears before me *person_mentioned*M. M. Battle.*/person_mentioned* Aled. for *location_mentioned*Dist. of San F De Austin*/location_mentioned* and makes Oath to the within a/c. and that the Same is Just and true. *date_mentioned n="11-05-1827">5th of Novr. 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M. M Battle*/person_mentioned*. Al. D. *location_mentioned*Sn. F.D. Austin.*/location_mentioned**/p* *p*Pay the within to *person_mentioned*M B Nuckols*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-05-1827">Nov. 5th. 1827 */date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Faris and White*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-29-1829">1829. April 15*/date_mentioned* Received payment *person_mentioned* M B Nuckols*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
